alert.note: Alert for Cole (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 8:15PM CDT until June 03 at 8:40PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Moreau River near Jefferson City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Moreau River near Jefferson City. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Near this height, both Bainer Road and Loesch Road will be closed. These roads are about 15.5 to 16 river miles upstream of the gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 18.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Moreau River Jefferson City 17.0 11.4 17.3 6.2 3.3 2.5 2.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
